desc: 100 Daily is a health drink comprised of 27 vitamins, minerals, and immune boosting ingredients your body needs on a daily basis for optimal health. Organic, all natural, and no added sugars. Order today!

layout.text: 100% Daily Value of Essential Vitamins and Minerals in ONE Convenient Daily Serving!
